meals.title: SeaFood Special
meals.description: Fried Salmon Special: Indulge in our exquisite seafood dishes, featuring the freshest catch of the day. Our chefs prepare each meal with passion, ensuring a delightful culinary experience for our guests.

meals.title: Sumptuous Desserts
meals.description: Choco Ice Cream Sandwich: Satisfy your sweet tooth with our array of delectable desserts. From rich chocolate creations to fruity delights, we have something to please every palate.

meals.title: Buffet
meals.description: Mixed Buffet: Experience a world of flavors at our extensive buffet. With a wide variety of dishes from different cuisines, you'll find something new and exciting with every visit.
